attributes.action: Make it illegal for teachers to say no when a student needs the toilet
attributes.additional_details: The gov should do this because sometimes a student may have an embarrassing medical illness they don’t want to share with anyone and may need to use the toilet and incase someone who Doesnr needs it really badly and the teacher says no over and over and over again it can cause the student to have an embarrassing moment in the classroom and therefore distract the learning of others. Needing the toilet and not being able to go can cause distress and therefore distract the student for from learning
attributes.background: I want the government to make it illegal for a teacher to say no to a student when he/she/they want to use the toilet and say yes
